snippet.title: Rise of Industry II - New Trailer | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
The new trailer for Rise of Industry II, a city builder and strategic management sim where you navigate the competitive landscape of vibrant 1980s USA! This trailer highlights some of the core mechanics of gameplay, including the new Campaign mode alongside the popular Sandbox mode. Rise of Industry II is coming to PC in 2025, and there's a free demo available now on Steam. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #riseofindustry2 #riseofindustry #gdc

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
